comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: translation: Girls fold envelops in the factory of the firm Bontamps at Venlo. After a apprenticeship of 2,5 until 3 months they fold 3000 until 4000 envelops a day. Folding by hand is only used with small numbers and odd sizes. This work is also done by machines. A machine folds per day 30.000 until 100.000 items
